Pricing.title: Choose Your Success Plan
Pricing.subtitle: Flexible pricing options designed to fit your study schedule and budget. All plans include our guarantee: pass your test or get your money back.

threeDay.name: 3-Day Access
features: Full access to all practice questions

guarantee.title: 100% Money-Back Guarantee
guarantee.description: We're so confident in our platform that if you don't pass your driving test after using our materials, we'll refund your money. No questions asked.

WhyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Our Platform?
WhyChooseUs.subtitle: Join thousands of successful drivers who chose the most trusted and comprehensive driving test preparation platform in Canada.

trusted.title: Trusted by New Canadian Residents
trusted.description: Over 50,000 immigrants and new drivers have successfully passed their tests using our platform.

realQuestions.title: Real Exam Questions
realQuestions.description: Our questions are modeled exactly on the official Canadian driving test format and content.

languages.title: 24+ Languages Available
languages.description: Study in your native language with support for Arabic, Chinese, French, Spanish, Urdu, and more.

loginOptions.title: Simple Login Options
loginOptions.description: Access with your phone number, email, or try sample questions without creating an account.

FreeTrialSection.title: Try 3-4 Sample Questions Free!
FreeTrialSection.subtitle: Experience our platform with real practice questions. No signup required, no credit card needed. Just pure, authentic Canadian driving test preparation.

HowItWorks.title: How It Works
HowItWorks.subtitle: Our proven 4-step process has helped over 50,000 new drivers pass their Canadian driving test. Simple, effective, and guaranteed to work.

choosePlan.title: Choose a Plan
choosePlan.description: Select the study duration that fits your schedule - 3 days, 4 days, or get the premium guide.

answerQuestions.title: Answer Practice Questions
answerQuestions.description: Practice with real exam-style questions, get instant feedback, and learn from detailed explanations.

readGuide.title: Read the Guide (Optional)
readGuide.description: Enhance your knowledge with our comprehensive study guide covering all Canadian driving rules.

passTest.title: Pass the Real Test!
passTest.description: Walk into your driving test with confidence and pass on your first try, just like thousands before you.

cta.readySubtitle: Join thousands of successful drivers who chose our proven method. Start with our free trial today!

MultilingualSection.title: Study in Your Native Language
MultilingualSection.subtitle: We understand that learning in your native language makes all the difference. That's why our platform supports 24+ languages to help you succeed.

languageSelector.description: Our intelligent language switcher adapts the entire platform to your preferred language, including questions, explanations, and interface elements.

PaymentMethods.title: Secure Payment Options
PaymentMethods.subtitle: We accept multiple payment methods to make your purchase convenient and secure. All transactions are protected with bank-level encryption.

ssl.title: SSL Encryption
ssl.description: All data transmitted is encrypted with 256-bit SSL security

pci.title: PCI Compliant
pci.description: We meet the highest standards for payment processing

fraud.title: Fraud Protection
fraud.description: Advanced fraud detection keeps your information safe

PaymentMethods.importantInfo: We do not accept e-transfers at this time. Please use one of the accepted payment methods above. All payments are processed instantly, and you'll receive immediate access to your chosen plan.

LegalSection.canadaDescription: Our platform and advertising are exclusively targeted to users within Canada. We comply with all Canadian privacy laws and regulations to ensure your data is protected.

features.canadianContent: Content specifically designed for Canadian driving laws
features.supportTimeZones: Customer support in Canadian time zones

advertiseCTA.title: Want to Advertise with Us?
advertiseCTA.description: If you're a Canadian business looking to reach new drivers, we offer advertising opportunities.

pipeda.title: PIPEDA Compliant
pipeda.description: We follow Canada's Personal Information Protection and Electronic Documents Act

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.description: Your personal information is stored securely and never shared with third parties

canadianLaw.title: Canadian Law
canadianLaw.description: All services operate under Canadian jurisdiction and consumer protection laws
